game.name: Tank Zombie Smasher
game.shortDescription: Tank Zombie Smasher you control a tank on the insane speed, blowing up everything on your way and smashing zombies coming to you.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Tank Zombie Smasher you control a tank on the insane speed, blowing up everything on your way and smashing zombies coming to you.

reviewHighlights.text: Fully completed in under 10 mins. Like an old flash game, has a couple of glitches. Should not buy if over 50 cents USD, but a decent addition to a li...
